text: Daniel James Itodo (born 14 December 1996) is a Nigerian international footballer who plays for Plateau United, as a left back. ==Career== Born in Makurdi, Itodo has played club football for Celtic, DSS and Plateau United. He made his international debut for Nigeria in 2018. ==Playing style== Itodo is known for his long throws. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigeria international footballers Category:DSS F.C. players Category:Plateau United F.C. players Category:Nigerian Professional Football League players Category:People from Benue State Category:Association football fullbacks
title: Daniel Itodo
